question: I slit both of my wrists?
question_content: Nothing ever works. I push as hard as I can onto my wrist and drag the knife but I can never get deep enough to get a vein. Is there a better way to kill yourself because I've done this 4 times now with no success? Would an overdose be easier? I have a new prescription of Lexapro 20mg but I'm not sure if that would work or not.

answers.answer_content: Lexapro wouldn't work...however, if you took them once daily as prescribed you probably wouldn't want to kill yourself anymore...which would be good.

If you are serious, I will tell you that 10 yrs from now you won't even remember what made you so upset that you would want to do that. I suggest that you go volunteer to help handicapped children,blind children or go to the children's hospital in your city and sit with children that don't have a choice of living or dying. I dare you,I really do.

You're doing wrong I know that much. But I won't tell you the right way. Especially if you think swallowing a bunch of random pills will kill you. That's either extremely ignorant or extremely desperate.
I've tryed that before and never worked so I tryed a blade from a shaver and that worked a little but not enough to kill myself and why would you wanna kill yourself in the first place??

Call this #
They will give you some good tips
